question: In which state/UT, National Center for Disease Control conducted a Sero-prevalence study?
explanation:
The National Centre for Disease Control and the Delhi government conducted Sero-prevalence study across 11 districts of Delhi.
As per the results of the study, 23.48 per cent of the samples had past infections. It means that almost one in four persons living in Delhi has antibodies against the coronavirus. It also indicated that around 3.85 million people living in Delhi had exposure to the virus.
